channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 28th March
item.description:
Pothole CW 600mm x 400mm x 55mm Give and take TM Outside 12 (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles parking on pavement, 28th March
item.description:
I have a dropped curb and over the last 22 years the number of vehicles that drive on the pavement and then parked blocking my driveway has increased at one point I counted approximately 12 cars one after the other. There are a few car parking spaces opposite me for people going into the shops but I still have ignorant people parking in an inconsiderate manner. The local pedestrians have to walk into the road because of the cars being left where are across my driveway and prohibiting me access and egress. If someone was to just walk around here you would be able to see the scale of cars being parked on the pavements. Regards Mrs L Magor

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackbird Avenue, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
